ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the Day of Decision. We have gathered you and the earlier peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That will be the Day of Reckoning. Gathered will be (you) and the earlier (generations).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That is the Day of Judgement on which We have assembled you as well as all those who went before you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: That is the Day of Judgment. We will bring you together with all the ancient peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the Day of Decision; We have gathered you and all the earlier men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That will be a Day of Decision! We have brought you and the men of old together!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the day of decision: We have gathered you and those of yore.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the Day of Decision; We have joined you with the ancients;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is the Day of Decision, We have brought you and the men of old together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is the Day of Judgement. We have assembled you all together with past generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is the Day of Decision, We have assembled both ye and the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘This is the Day of Judgement. We have brought you together with the former generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That will be a Day of Decision! We have brought you and the men of old together!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such is the Day of Decision. We will gather you with the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is the Day of Separation; We have gathered you, together with the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:38] ‘This is the Day of Decision. We have brought you, O deniers from this community, and the ancients together, [the ancients] from among the deniers before you, so that you will [all] be reckoned with and chastised together;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is the Day of Decision) regarding created beings, (We have brought you) disbelievers (and the men of old together) as well as those who were after you.
